```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
list.files("data")
homicides <- read.csv("data/homicide-data.csv")
```

```{r}
homicides <- homicides %>% 
  mutate(reported_date = ymd(reported_date)) %>% 
  mutate(month = month(reported_date, label=TRUE, abbr=FALSE))
```
